about_the_game:
Burrow of the Fallen Bear Guide is a spoiler document with all choices you need to make to unlock all CGs as well as get ALL the endings. It's the easiest way for you to unlock the whole content of the game (including Steam Achievements).

This DLC contains a pdf document FULL OF SPOILERS about Burrow of the Fallen Bear.

To access the document, you need to go to:

Location:
C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Burrow of the Fallen Bear A Gay Furry Visual Novels\Fallen Bear - Walkthrough v102.pdf

short_description: Do you want to make all the right choices to unlock all CGs available in the game as well as get ALL the endings? Get a PDF document FULL OF SPOILERS about Burrow of the Fallen Bear right now and unlock all achievements!
